content: --रूप {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} taking any form at will; जानामि त्वां प्रकृतिपुरुषं कामरूपं मघोनः <ls>Me. 6.</ls> {2} beautiful, pleasing. (--पाः (pl) a district lying in the east of Bengal (the western portion of Assam); <ls>R. 4. 83</ls>, <ls n="R. 4.">84.</ls>

कामरूप An important kingdom said to have extended from the banks of the Karatoyā or Sadānīrā to the extremities of Assam. It must have extended up to the Himālaya on the north and the borders of China on the east, as its king is said to have assisted Duryodhana with an army of Kirātas and Cīnas. The ancient capital of this kingdom was प्राग्ज्योतिष on the other side of the Lauhitya or the river Brahmaputra; <ab>cf.</ab> <ls>R. 4. 81.</ls>
